arts.ttl: Chris Richards reflects on Fredrikstad fixture ahead of a trip to a ‘tough team to break down’
arts.sum: “They played a good game on Thursday, they're a tough team to break down. “They’re tough, but it's kind of what we've dreamt of: being able to play: Tuesday, Wednesday, or Thursday, and Sunday, so I think it's just part of the progression.

arts.ttl: Fredrikstad vs Crystal Palace: UEFA Conference League Play Off Preview, 2nd Leg, 2025
arts.sum: Glasner’s side were in action again on Sunday, drawing 1-1 with Nottingham Forest at home in their second Premier League game of the season. On Thursday last week, Crystal Palace and Fredrikstad played the first leg of their play-off tie as only one of these two sides can earn a place in the league phase of the Conference League.

arts.ttl: Fredrikstad vs Crystal Palace - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Conference League playoff second-leg clash between Fredrikstad and Crystal Palace, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
